1.2.4.name: connect20/TEM_AbandonedCart
1.2.4.description: With the right program, you can expect to achieve a 15%-25% conversion rate! Optimum performance is achieved by sending a series of personalized abandon alerts which display items currently in the shopping cart and an effective email strategy which tests various promotions and constantly analyzes key email metrics.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
